comment.author: 50796857@N04
comment._content: I'm an amateur songwriter and I'm building a slideshow to post to YouTube for a song of mine called, "ON THE RIVER". Your photo at www.flickr.com/photos/osucommons/3946123522/ is excellent. Can I use it in my slideshow? (I'll credit you for it- perhaps "courtesy of Oregon State University Archives@flickr") You can reach me at papadavelavell@yahoo.com -Papa Dave
